mods.abstract: Runaway in Jail. WAS COMMITTED to the Parish Jail of St. Landry, on the 4th September inst, a negro boy calling himself EDMOND aged about 15 years, 4 feet 11 inches high ; says he belongs to Mr. John Thorn, of this Parish. The owner is hereby requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away ; otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. L.V. CHACHERE, Sheriff. Opelousas, Sept 12, 1863.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
